reference.title: Image Types in Figma
reference.shortdesc: This table shows the image filetypes supported by Figma.

strow.stentry: JSON animations/Lottie, WEBP, GIF, Video (MP4, MOV, etcâ€¦)

refbody.section: Figma can export PNG, JPG, WEBP, or SVG, in multiple scales (1x-3x), with transparent or opaque backgrounds (for PNG and WBP only.)
